text: Kee nummayse maraaw! Labha labhal siinik anqase waytay, keenik tayse labhaay takkehik elle anqasan labha. Kaadu agabi agabul siinik anqasewaay keenik yayse agabuuy yakkeenihik elle anqasan agabi. Kaadu sitta maqaybisinaay, uma- bagullel (Sali-migaaqal) sittah maseecina, manxu uma migaaqaay moominti faasiktul (umeynal) muggaqsimam iimaanaak gamadal, kaadu amahak aduurewaah toobitewaa marii, too mari usun daalimiini
